Row.Text: Contention in the State Duma

Once again, the Duma is teeming with liberal and social democrats clamouring for radical change that threaten not only the nation, but also our divine right to the throne of Russia. We must act decisively and prevent this matter from stoking the fires of an uprising.[NEWLINE]
We pledged an oath to God and to the Russian People. We shall not concede!
Dissolve the Duma. Have it re-elected.
It is time that we go the way of the Constitutional Monarch.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith and {3_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital celebrates 10 turns of 'We Love the King Day'[ENDCOLOR]
We have stood firm against contention against us within the State Duma.
We have dissolved the State Duma and called for its re-election.
We have pledged to adopt a Constitutional Monarchy.
Nicholas II faces contention within the State Duma of Russia.
Illness Strikes Our Heir

Our beloved son and heir, sickly all his young life, has fallen gravely ill once more. His mother weeps for his life, and the future of our nation remains tenuous should he not recover. We must enlist the best possible aide to see Alexei well again.[NEWLINE]
Send for the best Russian doctors possible!
Send for a holy man from one of our Monasteries.
Send a stern letter to his Great-Grandmother for her ill bloodline.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]50% chance that Alexei will recover and you will gain a 5 turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]25% chance that Alexei will recover and you will gain 5 turns of 'We Love the King Day' in all cities[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]10% chance that Alexei will recover and you will gain a free Great Scientist[ENDCOLOR]

We have summoned the greatest medical doctors in all the land to care for our ill-stricken son. And for good cause, for Alexei has recovered with the aide of the modern marvels of medicine. This is cause for the utmost of celebrations!
We have summoned the greatest medical doctors in all the land to care for our ill-stricken son. But to our grave dismay, the doctors could not save him, and this time our son Alexei has perished.
We have summoned a great mystic called Rasputin to our court to attend to our ill-stricken son. And praise be to God, for Alexei has recovered from his terrible illness.

We have summoned a great mystic called Rasputin to our court to attend to our ill-stricken son. But woe betide us, for the mystic could do nothing to save our dear Alexei, and he has unfortunately perished.

We have written a scolding letter to our Great-Grandmother-in-law for her abysmal genetic bloodline, which has fated out son's present illness. And by some miracle, she has sent her greatest court physician to us in response.

We have written a scolding letter to our Great-Grandmother-in-law for her abysmal genetic bloodline, which has fated out son's present illness. Unfortunately, this has done little of practical use, and poor Alexei remains deathly ill.
The heir of Nicholas II has passed away.
